nodes.text: Nano-droids were a type of microscopic technology that could be used for following targets or as explosives.
Vrath Xizor used a solution of tracking nano-droids to follow Zeerid Korr, via them adhering to the bottom of his boot, during 3653 BBY.
Letta Turmond fed nano-droids to her husband, an Abyssin Jedi Temple worker named Jackar Bowmani, and used him to stage a bombing of the Temple hanger during the Clone Wars around 20 BBY.
